description: Marina Abramovic styles herself as the "grandmother of performance art" and Belgrade is where she began.
title: Naked artists in Serbia breathing life into damaged art scene
title_page: Naked artists in Serbia breathing life into damaged art scene - BBC News
maintext: "We still have an underground performance art scene. But there comes a point after a few years where you ask yourself why you're doing this - when there are few people coming to see you. And most of them are your colleagues," she says.
